posts.author: William Miller
posts.content: Did you know? Valentine's Day originated from ancient Roman traditions and was originally called Lupercalia. It wasn't until the 14th century that it became associated with romantic love. Learn more about the history of Valentine's Day here: [Link] #ValentinesDay #History
